attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the governament to reconsider the carter review as the most vulnerable in society will suffer, without adequate and good quality legal advice and representation.  Many reputable  high street firms may have to close, making it challenging  for  those seeking training contracts in the area of social welfare, especially after years of studying part time and gaining voluntary work experience to enter the profession.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/scrap-carter/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
